jobDescription: WE are looking for a Data Analyst with strong business/data analysis experience, who process driven, and has data modeling skills with a customer-oriented attitude to drive problem solving and operational excellence.  The successful candidate will work with the team to develop solutions for data collection, cleansing, aggregation, and modeling to support statistical data analysis, risk assessment, performance monitoring, and process optimization Responsibilities include:Understanding requirements and implementationCommunicating with an Offshore team, explain requirements, and resolve outstanding issuesStrong analysis and data modeling skillsData Visualization experienceTechnical architecture level understanding process automationAbility to work independently on complex projectsKnowledge in enterprise data relationshipHigh attention to detail and ability to work within stringent deadlinesBasic Qualifications:Rich experience in developing Business Intelligence solutionsCosmos, SQL, SSAS, Power BI)Experience with resolving data quality issuesBA/BS degree in CS/MIS Information Systems or related discipline5+ years Information Technology experience
